subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 26 points, the rookie point guard Norris Cole came up with 14 of his 20 points in the fourth quarter as Miami beat visiting Boston, 115-107.
snippet: LeBron James scored 26 points, the rookie point guard Norris Cole came up with 14 of his 20 points in the fourth quarter as Miami beat visiting Boston, 115-107.
